# HasModel

**Protocol**

An interface that provides meshes and materials to define the visual appearance of an entity.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency protocol HasModel : HasTransform
```

## Retrieving a model

- **model**: The model component for the entity.

## Managing joints

- **jointNames**: The names of all the joints in the model entity.
- **jointTransforms**: The relative joint transforms of the model entity.

## Instance Properties

- **blendWeightNames**: The names of the weights on each blend shape in the model entity.
- **blendWeights**: The blend shape weights in the model entity.
- **modelDebugOptions**: Configures the debug visualization of this model.

## Inherits From

- HasTransform

## Conforming Types

- BodyTrackedEntity
- ModelEntity
